page.title: 18 The Double Six Station
page.content:
We asked some questions to the owner of Double Six Service Station on the A163. He has been working there for 14 months and puts in a 90 hour week. He does not bored as he is very busy all the time. He estimated that around 100 people stop at the station every day. He sells 3000 gallons a week. The station also sells car accessories, sweets and drinks. The owner told us that he obtains broken-down cars eventually sells many of the cars he has repaired. The station is 22 years old. He has one man working for him. The station is open 7 days a week. Current prices per gallon are as follows: 2 star=197p 3 star=198p 4 star=199p diesel=197p
Oil is 95p per litre.
